item.title: Wargroove 2 coming to iOS, Android on July 30
item.content:encoded:
Chucklefish will release Wargroove 2: Pocket Edition for iOS via App Store and Android via Google Play on July 30 for $7.99, the developer announced.

Wargroove 2 first launched for Switch and PC via Steam on October 5, 2023, followed by Xbox Series, Xbox One, and PC via Microsoft Store on September 19, 2024.

Here is an overview of the game, via its store pages:

About

Take to the battlefield with Wargroove, the award-winning strategy game —now on mobile! Play solo or with friends with Local and Online Multiplayer.

Choose your Commander and wage turn-based war on battling factions. Design and share maps, cutscenes and campaigns with easy-to-use editors and in-depth customization tools!

Wargroove 2: Pocket Edition offers retro turn-based tactical combat on the go, bringing the latest and greatest entry in the series, Wargroove 2, to mobile devices, with fully optimized and intuitive touchscreen controls—ready to play anywhere!

Key Features

  • Trouble stirs in Aurania—battle your way through a 20-hour Campaign, with three interweaving stories!
  • Experience a new story with retro-inspired turn-based tactics gameplay of Wargroove—now on mobile!
  • Battle with or against friends with Local Multiplayer—just pass the device and play!
  • Online Multiplayer up to four players, cross-platform play to other versions of Wargroove 2.
  • A vibrant cast of over 20 Commanders and six warring Factions.
  • Unique ultimate moves! Unleash your Commander’s powerful Groove ability to turn the tide of battle.
  • Create, customize and share with in-depth customization tools
  • Lead a roguelike conquest! A challenging game mode dedicated to putting your tactical abilities to the test
  • Build your army and refine your strategy with unique unit types, maximize your army’s impact with critical moves
  • Play with up two four players locally or online! Simply pass the device around or connect online with cross-platform play.
